statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' AND age < 50;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL AND age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 OR age > 60;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, medical_history FROM patients WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT patient_id, name, consultation_date FROM patients JOIN consultations ON patients.patient_id = consultations.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, name, consultation_date, consultation_notes FROM patients JOIN consultations ON patients.patient_id = consultations.patient_id WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN consultations ON patients.patient_id = consultations.patient_id WHERE consultation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, age, medical_history FROM patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT p.name, c.consultation_date, c.consultation_notes FROM patients p JOIN consultations c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id ORDER BY c.consultation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, medical_history FROM patients WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, consultation_date FROM consultations ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT name, age, medical_history FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT consultation_date, diagnosis, prescription FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, name, email FROM doctors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_id, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, consultation_type FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT name, consultation_date FROM Doctors JOIN Consultations ON Doctors.doctor_id = Consultations.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT Doctors.name, Consultations.consultation_date FROM Doctors JOIN Consultations ON Doctors.doctor_id = Consultations.doctor_id;

SELECT Patients.name, Appointments.appointment_date, Doctors.specialization FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Consultations ON Appointments.appointment_id = Consultations.appointment_id JOIN Doctors ON Consultations.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31';
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date >= '2023-02-01' ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, medical_history FROM patients WHERE name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patients.name, doctors.specialization FROM patients JOIN consultations ON patients.patient_id = consultations.patient_id JOIN doctors ON doctors.doctor_id = consultations.doctor_id;
SELECT consultations.consultation_id, prescriptions.prescription_details FROM consultations LEFT JOIN prescriptions ON consultations.consultation_id = prescriptions.consultation_id;

SELECT doctors.name, consultations.consultation_date, prescriptions.prescription_details FROM doctors JOIN consultations ON doctors.doctor_id = consultations.doctor_id LEFT JOIN prescriptions ON consultations.consultation_id = prescriptions.consultation_id WHERE doctors.specialization = 'Cardiology';
